issue.title: very minor editorial change intptr_t / uintptr_t

discussion.p: In the synopsis, some types are identified as optional: int8_t, int16_t, and so on, consistently with C99, indeed.
On the other hand, intptr_t and uintptr_t, are not marked as such and probably should, consistently with C99, 7.18.1.4.

blockquote.pre: ... typedef signed integer type intptr_t; // optional ... typedef unsigned integer type uintptr_t; // optional ...

issue.rationale: Recommend NAD and fix as editorial with the proposed resolution.
